text:
[Verse]
Woke up this morning
Sunshine nowhere to be found
Clouds rolling in
Rain pouring down

[Verse 2]
Grabbed my old jacket
Stepped out the door
Puddles all around me
Got no plans no more

[Chorus]
I'm dancing in the rain
Feeling so alive again
Spinning round no pain
Just dancing in the rain

[Verse 3]
Neighbors looking strange
They don't understand
Life’s a song we're singing
Let's dance hand in hand

[Bridge]
Splashing in the street
Rhythm in my feet
Every drop a beat
Life can be so sweet

[Chorus]
I'm dancing in the rain
Feeling so alive again
Spinning round no pain
Just dancing in the rain
title: Dancing in the Rain
